en-US.summary: Listen to the UK's best variety internet radio station.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Bounce FM to play
en-US.name: BounceFM
en-US.description:
Listen to Bounce Radio Radio, out with the old, in with the new.

Bounce Radio provides a high quality sound 24/7 with the best music.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch BounceFM" or "Alexa, play BounceFM " to start the radio".

At anytime, you can stop the radio by saying "Alexa, stop"
